io.confluent.ksql.services

Class DefaultServiceContext

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.confluent.ksql.services.DefaultServiceContext
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ServiceContext, java.lang.AutoCloseable

    public class DefaultServiceContext
extends java.lang.Object
implements ServiceContext
    A real service context, initialized from a KsqlConfig instance.

      • getAdminClient

        public org.apache.kafka.clients.admin.Admin getAdminClient()
        Description copied from interface: ServiceContext
        Get the shared Admin instance.

        The default implementation is thread-safe and can be shared across threads.

        The caller must not close the returned shared instance.

        Specified by:
        getAdminClient in interface ServiceContext
        Returns:
        a shared Admin instance.

      • getKafkaClientSupplier

        public org.apache.kafka.streams.KafkaClientSupplier getKafkaClientSupplier()
        Description copied from interface: ServiceContext
        Get the KafkaClientSupplier instance.

        The default implementation is thread-safe and can be shared across threads to create the standard Kafka clients, some of which are not thread-safe.

        The caller is responsible for closing any clients created by the factory.

        Specified by:
        getKafkaClientSupplier in interface ServiceContext
        Returns:
        a KafkaClientSupplier.

      • getSchemaRegistryClient

        public io.confluent.kafka.schemaregistry.client.SchemaRegistryClient getSchemaRegistryClient()
        Description copied from interface: ServiceContext
        Get the shared SchemaRegistryClient instance.

        The default implementation is thread-safe, but makes heavy use of synchronization. As such, this shared instance should not be used for performance sensitive operations.

        A factory method for instances is available for use during performance sensitive operations, see ServiceContext.getSchemaRegistryClientFactory()

        Specified by:
        getSchemaRegistryClient in interface ServiceContext
        Returns:
        a shared SchemaRegistryClient.

      • getSchemaRegistryClientFactory

        public java.util.function.Supplier<io.confluent.kafka.schemaregistry.client.SchemaRegistryClient> getSchemaRegistryClientFactory()
        Description copied from interface: ServiceContext
        Get a supplier of SchemaRegistryClient instance.

        The default implementation of the supplier is thread-safe. The returned clients are also, by default, thread-safe. However, they make heavy use of synchronization, and hence should not be shared across threads for performance sensitive operations.

        A shared instance is available for use during non performance sensitive operations, see ServiceContext.getSchemaRegistryClient()

        Specified by:
        getSchemaRegistryClientFactory in interface ServiceContext
        Returns:
        a shared SchemaRegistryClient.
